mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_lexical_items(text):
    words = re.sub('', '', text).lower().split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    return word_counts

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_lexical_items(text):
    words = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text).lower().split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    return word_counts
